posts.message:
Open ERP/Python Developer needed

currently our client looking for developers to assist in the customization of an OpenERP system. to streamline the following internal processes and systems:
    CRM
    Call center application,
    Ticketing system,
    Workflows,
    Reporting,

Responsibilities:
 
- Develop code and/or set user interface parameters in order to customize the system in line with the functional requirements under the directives of the project manager,

- Assist the project manager in planning the development and testing efforts,
 
- Assist the project manager in documenting the functional requirements of the system,
 
- Build and deliver documentation on the customizations and the overall system,

- Assist in the testing of the system, execute test scripts,
    Provide ongoing system support.

to Apply Send your CV to jobs@taswek.com
